# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the clip view’s background.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is supplied by the current [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/controlBackgroundColor].

## Working with Background Color

- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value that indicates if the clip view draws its background color.
